OrgName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE AFRICAN CARIBBEAN BUSINESS AND ENTERPRISE TRAINING CENTRE LTD (SYAC LTD) - INFORMATION FOR SMALL BUSINESS

Desc.entry: A not-for-profit, social enterprise that provides training, business advice and counselling support for Asian and African Carribean people who want to set up their own business enterprise. Also acts as an access point for referral to other agencies. Other facilities and resources include a nursery, meeting rooms, offices, workshops, conference and training facilities. Unit space is available to all sections of the community. Company limited by guarantee no. 3121067
